title: Oxenfree
description: A supernatural thriller about a group of friends on a haunted island. Focus on dialogue and slow-burn tension.
player_quote: Feels like a cozy campfire ghost story with friends.

title: Observation
description: You play as the AI on a damaged space station, piecing together what happened.
player_quote: Creepy, slow sci-fi where YOU are the station watching everything.

title: Spiritfarer
description: A cozy management game about guiding spirits to the afterlife, with lots of emotional story moments.
player_quote: The most wholesome game about death I've ever played.

title: Signalis
description: Retro-style survival horror with strong atmosphere and puzzles, inspired by classic PS1 horror.
player_quote: Like classic Silent Hill but with sci-fi androids.
